properties.Name: CapitalBudget
properties.Description:
A Budget plan that is prepared for individual capital expenditure projects.

This budget is dependent upon the length of the project.

Capital expenditures to be budgeted include:

-  Replacement
-  Acquisition
-  Major equipment
-  Construction

Columns.Name: CapitalExpenditureBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Capital Expenditure Budget.

Columns.Name: CapitalExpenditureBudgetVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Capital Expenditure Budget Version.

Columns.Name: BudgetPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date covered by the Capital Expenditure Budget.

Columns.Name: BudgetPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date covered by the Capital Expenditure Budget.

Columns.Name: TotalMachineryExpenditureAmount
Columns.Description: The total expenditure amount allocated to machinery expenditures.

Columns.Name: TotalEquipmentExpenditureAmount
Columns.Description: The total expenditure amount allocated to equipment expenditures.

Columns.Name: TotalFurnitureAndFixturesExpenditureAmount
Columns.Description: The total expenditure amount allocated to furniture and fixtures expenditures.

Columns.Name: TotalBuildingsExpenditureAmount
Columns.Description: The total expenditure amount allocated to buildings expenditures.

Columns.Name: TotalLandExpenditureAmount
Columns.Description: The total expenditure amount allocated to land expenditures.

Columns.Name: TotalCapitalBudgetExpendituresAmount
Columns.Description: The total of all expenditures associated with the Capital Expenditure Budget.

Columns.Name: FinancialBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Budget.

Columns.Name: FinancialBudgetVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Budget Version.

Properties.Description:
A Budget plan that is prepared for individual capital expenditure projects.

This budget is dependent upon the length of the project.

Capital expenditures to be budgeted include:

-  Replacement
-  Acquisition
-  Major equipment
-  Construction
